charges.charge_description: 18-1708-Knowingly and intentionally have in possession nine (9) BankAmericard Mastercard credit cards and four (4) BankAmericard Visa Cards which had been stolen, taken, embezzeld amd pbstructed from out of the United States Mail, mail receptacle and an authorized depository for the United States Mail matter, well knowing that said credit cards were stolen, taken, embezzled and obstructed.
